*** Variables ***
${LOGIN.ALL}      UC4_RL.LOGIN.ALL
${LOGIN.ORACLE}    LOGIN.ORACLE
${LOGIN.SUDO}     LOGIN.SUDOERS    # login object for sudo user
${LOGIN.SUDO.NOPASS}    LOGIN.SUDOERS.NOPW    # login object of sudo user but not require password
${LOGIN.NOT.SUDOER}    LOGIN.NOT.SUDOERS    # login object of user which is not sudoer
${LOGIN.ROOT}     LOGIN.ROOT    # login for user root
